# edgeCreasesElement

**Instance Property**

The geometry element identifying which edges of the geometry’s surface should remain sharp after subdivision.

## Declaration

```swift
var edgeCreasesElement: SCNGeometryElement? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This geometry element’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNGeometryElement/primitiveType] value must be [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNGeometryPrimitiveType/line]. The geometry element’s data is an array of vertex indices, each pair of which defines a line segment identifying an edge to be treated as a crease during subdivision. Use the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNGeometry/edgeCreasesSource] property to specify the smoothness or sharpness of each crease.

## Smoothing and Subdividing Geometry

- **subdivisionLevel**: The number of subdivisions SceneKit uses to smooth the geometry’s surface at render time.
- **edgeCreasesSource**: The geometry source specifying the smoothness or sharpness of edges after surface subdivision.
- **wantsAdaptiveSubdivision**
